ecr.description: Name of the ECR repository and tag (conventionally separated by a colon)

dockerfile.description: Path and name of the Dockerfile

profile.description: AWS profile name (which must be defined in the ~/.aws/credentials file) if AWS keys aren't defined as env vars

ui.description: Name of the web/UI project to include in the assets included in the Docker image

cluster.description: AWS cluster for identifying the ECS service to redeploy

region.description: AWS region for identifying the ECS service to redeploy

service.description: AWS service for identifying the ECS service to redeploy
